lines.text: The... wizards' tattoo ink... was magnetic.
And Slick's aim was a little off... but the magnetic ink made the bullet swing around.
And it just sorta Apollo 13'd its way back to Slick!
Any magnet strong enough to alter the trajectory of a bullet is one that'd knock out my radio.
...Yeah, no. It's all copacetic. Just makin' a point about our radios to the consultant.
No, yeah. %CTHEYRE% bein' incredibly stupid, it's a thing with %THEM%.
